name: Facing Friday
tag_list: vacation-planners, womens-vacation, womens-weekend-in-boston, boston-girls-night-out, girls-weekend-boston, bachelorette-parties-boston, girls-weekend-boston-destinations, weekend-in-boston, high-end-girls-weekend
overview: Facing Friday is the smart way to plan a perfect weekend that you’ll long remember. If your “down time” is precious (and whose isn’t?) then let us help with suggestions on how to turn another Friday into the start of a fun and memorable experience! Researched and scouted by our travel experts, each weekend getaway is carefully planned and budget-priced. Facing Friday is a subsidiary of the famous Boston-based Show of the Month Club and all travel arrangements are made by its Travel Club. The Clubs are known for service and famous for value.
